name: riceproductionbox
0:
”Alexa open rice production box”
”pre planting”
”more information”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rice production box
des: With rice production box an alexa skill, new and existing rice farmers can get more information on how to carry out a better rice farming processes, the skill guides the farmer on what to do before planting, when and what to do during planting, and what to do after planting, it also have instruction on how to treat common rice pest and disease, weeds control, watering, and harvesting. The skill also talks about the nutritional value of rice.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
